# ğŸ“§ Gmail_Fakex

**Gmail_Fakex** is a lightweight, open-source Python tool that generates temporary email addresses using the [mail.tm](https://mail.tm) API. It automatically creates a fake email, monitors incoming messages, and displays their content in the consoleâ€”perfect for testing, privacy, or automation workflows.

## ğŸš€ Features

- ğŸ” Auto-generates a temporary email with a random username  
- ğŸ“¥ Monitors inbox for new messages in real-time  
- ğŸ“¨ Displays subject, sender, and message content (text or HTML)  
- ğŸ”” Sends desktop notifications for incoming emails  
- ğŸ¨ Includes a hacker-style ASCII banner on launch
